articles.title: US advisers support expanding COVID boosters to all adults - Associated Press
articles.description: WASHINGTON (AP) — The U.S. government on Friday moved to open up COVID-19 booster shots to all adults, expanding efforts to get ahead of rising coronavirus cases that experts fear could snowball into a winter surge as millions of Americans travel for the holi…
